text.section: After consultation with the Secretary and to the extent permitted by existing administrative and fiscal resources, each health occupations board shall establish a disciplinary subcommittee.

To the extent deemed practicable by each board, a disciplinary subcommittee shall:
Be responsible for the investigation of complaints;
Determine whether the health occupations board should bring charges against a licensee or certificate holder; and
Participate in preadjudication case resolution conferences resulting from the charges.
